resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
This sample demonstrates the basic use of Camera2 API. Check the source code to see how you can display camera preview and take pictures.

Drag your finger to draw a rectangle enclosing the nutrition table. Drag again to redraw. Try to fit the rectangle as closely as possible around the table area. \n\nPress \'Continue\' in the top right-hand corner when done.
Smartphone-based Extraction of Nutrition Information\nfrom Food Label Images

This app demonstrates the nutrition information extraction algorithm running in real time. 

To get started, either choose a nutrition label image from the dataset or take a photo of one. 

For best results when capturing a new label image, keep the label text upright and make sure the text is in focus.
Press \'Start processing\' in the top right hand corner to begin processing. \n\nWhen the algorithm has finished running, the detected table will be displayed here.
